c:functionType.name: DimensionFormatter
c:functionType.c:documentation: A function that formats a value, possibly null, of the dimension's .

c:argument.name: sourceValue
c:argument.c:documentation:
The source (or raw) value, when the value was read from a data source, or undefined, otherwise.
In the case where the raw value is a Google-table-like cell, it is the value of its v property that is passed to this argument.

c:returns.c:documentation: The string that is the formatted value. Only the null value should have the empty string as the formatted value.
